content: fpdc 24 bpdc made round 3 chain 3 2 fpdc around first fpdc bpdc around each of next two bpdc around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 4 chain 3 fpdc around each of next two fpdc 2 bpdc around next bpdc bpdc around next bpdc around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 5 chain 3 fpdc around each of next two fpdc bpdc around next three bpdc around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 6 chain 3 fpdc around each of next two fpdc 2 bpdc around next bpdc bpdc around each of next two bpdc around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 round 7 chain 3 fpdc around each of next two fpdc bpdc around each of next four bpdc around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 rnds 8-16 repeat round 7 round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as joining single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 72 single_crochet round 18 repeat round 17 round 19 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as joining and in next 20 single_crochet place visor pieces together with ws facing and edges evenly held together pin if needed against front of hat insert hook into first bottom loops of each visor piece then into next single_crochet from round 18 yo and draw a loop up and through these three layers yo and draw through two loops on hook single_crochet single_crochet in same way across remaining 29 single_crochet of bottom of visor to connect it to cap 30 single_crochet single_crochet in next 21 sts around join with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet round 20 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as joining and next 20 single_crochet 10 single_crochet along edge of visor to corner 17 single_crochet across 17 sts of front of brim 10 single_crochet along other edge of visor single_crochet in remaining 21 single_crochet around join with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet fasten_off ©2005-2012 celeste young all rights reserved this pattern may be used for teaching purposes or to produce crocheted items for sale 2
